content:
---
title: T1562.001 - Sysmon Service was Disabled
group: Defense Evasion
description: The Sysmon service has been disabled.
authors:
  - JakePeralta


kind: evtx
level: critical
status: stable
timestamp: Event.System.TimeCreated


fields:
  - name: Event ID
    to: Event.System.EventID
  - name: Record ID
    to: Event.System.EventRecordID
  - name: Computer
    to: Event.System.Computer
  - name: Service Name
    to: Event.EventData.param1
  - name: Old Startup Type
    to: Event.EventData.param2
  - name: Current Startup Type
    to: Event.EventData.param3


filter:
  Event.System.EventID: 7040
  Event.EventData.param1: 
    - Sysmon
    - Sysmon64
  Event.EventData.param3: disabled

path: defense_evasion\T1562.001 - Sysmon Service set to Manual.yml
content:
---
title: T1562.001 - Sysmon Service set to Manual
group: Defense Evasion
description: The Sysmon service startup has been set to manual.
authors:
  - JakePeralta


kind: evtx
level: critical
status: stable
timestamp: Event.System.TimeCreated


fields:
  - name: Event ID
    to: Event.System.EventID
  - name: Record ID
    to: Event.System.EventRecordID
  - name: Computer
    to: Event.System.Computer
  - name: Service Name
    to: Event.EventData.param1
  - name: Old Startup Type
    to: Event.EventData.param2
  - name: Current Startup Type
    to: Event.EventData.param3


filter:
  Event.System.EventID: 7040
  Event.EventData.param1: 
    - Sysmon
    - Sysmon64
  Event.EventData.param3: demand start
